fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each day, the first time a non-Gatherer uses any role ability, you will create an NPC with the role and name "2159B Devil"
- At the end of each night, if at least one 2159B Devil attacked, one of your abilities will be disabled for the next day and night at random, and then you gain Mana of a random color.
- At the end of each night, each target of 2159B Devil attacks will have one of their abilities disabled for the next day and night at random, and then if they have any, a random limited-use ability will gain a use.
